name: Chroma Dash (Rileys Legacy)
description:
Become more powerful with each mistake in this 2D , arcade style, infinite runner.  Use the double and triple jump to carry you to the highscore with a new color scheme every run! Created in 48 hours for the Wowie Game Jam 3.0 (Theme: Failure is Progress).

Controls:

Use Space to jump.

Comment any suggestions  or feedback below, and thank you for playing! :)
